entities.name: goblins
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as being spoken to by the first man, and they respond in English.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as nodding at Hermione's mouthed words 'Goblins!'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as mouthing the word 'Goblins' to Harry.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is mentioned as being spoken to by the first man, and he responds in English.

entities.name: gornuk
entities.description: Gornuk is mentioned as joining forces with Ted.

entities.name: ted
entities.description: Ted is mentioned as being asked by the man what made him leave.

entities.name: tonks's father
entities.description: Tonks's father is revealed to be Ted, and he has a mellow voice.

relationships.description: Harry knows Hermione, as evidenced by his nodding at her mouthed words 'Goblins!'
Griphook and Gornuk joined forces not long after meeting.
Ted is revealed to be Tonks's father.
Harry knows Tonks's father, as evidenced by his recognition of the voice.
